com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view
Class MetaioCloudARViewActivity

java.lang.Object
  MapActivity
      com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view.MetaioCloudViewActivity
          com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view.MetaioCloudARViewActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, MediaPlayer.OnInfoListener, MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, com.metaio.cloud.plugin.data.MetaioCloudDataManager.Callback, MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
public class MetaioCloudARViewActivity
extends MetaioCloudViewActivity
implements MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, MediaPlayer.OnInfoListener

This is Junaio AR view activity. It may be executed with default behavior, however for customized behavior and GUI, this should be extended and relevant methods should be overridden.

Author:
arsalan.malik

onSurfaceCreated

public void onSurfaceCreated()
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
This is called when GLSurfaceView has been created. The rendering contents can be loaded in this callback, e.g geometries. Furthermore, renderer parameters such as clipping plane limits can be updated. The audio renderer for movie textures should be registered in this callback.

Specified by:
onSurfaceCreated in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
See Also:
getAudioRenderer

onSurfaceChanged

public void onSurfaceChanged(int width,
                             int height)
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Called when OpenGL surface is resized. The new dimensions must be passed to metaioSDK by calling metaioSDK.resizeRenderer.

Specified by:
onSurfaceChanged in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Parameters:
width - Width of the surface view
height - Height of the surface view

Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback

createCalendarEvent

public void createCalendarEvent(long startDate,
                                long endDate,
                                String subject,
                                String description,
                                String location)
Creates an event in the devices calendar. Call parent to create the event or override to customize the behavior.

Parameters:
startDate - timestamp representing the starting date
endDate - timestamp representing the ending date
subject - title of the event
description - description of the event
location - location of the event

saveToGalleryWithoutDialog - true to save to the gallery without prompting to do so
